Takamatsu Park (Japan): A visit to Takamatsu Park would not be complete
without taking a relaxing stroll on one of its many paths.
The path around the lake which is roughly 1.4 kilometers is
popular with runners. On a clear day look for Mt. Iwate looming
in the background. When in season the pink cherry blossoms
make a picturesque contrast to the snow-capped mountain.
